segments.text: What do you think about studying in the U . S . ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , for many international students , coming to the United States and living here and studying can be quite a daunting experience , especially when finding a house on campus or off campus .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think first of all for first-time students , coming and living on campus in dormitories can provide a certain level of security .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Uh , when you live off campus , there might be a certain amount of flexibility in choosing roommates that you might not have when living on campus .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will think over your advice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , of course , the choice is up to you . Good luck !
segments.speaker: S2
